name: In re CONDEMNATION BY the DELAWARE RIVER PORT AUTHORITY. Appeal of INTERSTATE OUTDOOR ADVERTISING, INC.
name_abbreviation: In re Condemnation by the Delaware River Port Authority

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY and CASTILLE, JJ.
NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: In re CONDEMNATION BY the DELAWARE RIVER PORT AUTHORITY. Appeal of INTERSTATE OUTDOOR ADVERTISING, INC.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Mark A. Lublin, Steven A. Haber, Philadelphia, for Interstate Outdoor Advertising, Inc.
James C. Crumlish, III, Frederick P. Santarelli, Blue Bell, for Delaware River Port Authority.
casebody.head_matter:
684 A.2d 120
In re CONDEMNATION BY the DELAWARE RIVER PORT AUTHORITY. Appeal of INTERSTATE OUTDOOR ADVERTISING, INC.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oet. 16, 1996.
Decided Nov. 8, 1996.
Mark A. Lublin, Steven A. Haber, Philadelphia, for Interstate Outdoor Advertising, Inc.
James C. Crumlish, III, Frederick P. Santarelli, Blue Bell, for Delaware River Port Authority.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY and CASTILLE, JJ.
